54414.「ヤッホー。ここは アクセサリー合成屋だよ。\n 同じアクセサリー同士を 合成す:
Ya... This is accessory synthesis. By combining the same accessories, you can add effects and enhance them... But be careful,
because you'll lose the accessory you chose for the synthesis. You can add up to three effects to a single accessory... But you can
also add a special effect called a lore effect by combining certain accessories... You need to have three synthesis effects on
the accessory you're using as a composite material, and one of them will become a lore effect... There aren't many accessories that
can do that... There's a lot more to it than that, but it's a long story, so if you're curious, just click on the "Ask me about it"
button... So, what can I do for you today?

54653.「他にも 合成したいアクセサリーがあったり？\n<yesno><break>:

98960.「ヤッホー。ここは アクセサリー合成屋だよ。\n 最近 海で見つけた きれいな真:
Ya... This is an accessory synthesis... We've recently started a new service using those beautiful pearls we found in the sea... From
now on, you can use an accessory that's already at +3 as a base for synthesis! But you won't be able to keep the 4 effects, so
be sure to think about which ones you want to remove after you're done. What can I do for you today?

99140.「＋３になってない アクセサリーは\n 第一伝承の素材には できないんだよねー。:
Accessories that aren't at +3 can't be used
as a material for the first lore.
<end>

99426.「ヤッホー。ここは アクセサリー合成屋だよ。\n 最近 実家の蔵にあった スゴい:
Ya... This is accessory synthesis... Recently, I read an amazing book in my parents' warehouse, and I started a new
service... It's called "Lore. It allows you to combine certain accessories to create a special effect called a lore effect... First,
you need to add three lore effects to a piece of jewelry made of a synthetic material. Then you combine them with a different type of
accessory... Ta-da! One of the synthetic effects on the synthetic material will be added as a lore effect... and if you add
three normal synthetic effects to the accessory with one lore effect and then combine it with a different type of
accessory... You'll get the original lore effect and one of the three additional lore effects as a second lore effect! The first
lore effect is called "First Lore" and the second is called "Second Lore." I'm not sure if this will show up on the test. Also, Lore
Synthesis doesn't increase your Synthesis Energy, and Lucky Synthesis and Kaiun Synthesis don't happen, so be careful...
There are only a few accessory combinations that can have the Lore effect... To find out which items can be combined, check the item's
"Learn More" section! So what can I do for you today?

99636.「このままだと 付いてる効果が 多すぎだね。\n <%sL_ACCE_ITEM>:
If I don't remove one, there'll be too many
effects. So, can you can please choose an
effect to remove?
<break>

<%sL_ACCE_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> has both a
synthesis effect and a lore effect. Which do
you want to get rid of?
<select_se_off>
Synthesis Effect
Lore Effect
<select_end>
<break>

117598.「……！ すごい反応！ 今なら\n どんな効果でも 付けられちゃいそうだよ～！\:
...wow, amazing! Looks like you can choose any effect that you want!
So, which one of these effects would you like?

<break>

effect you really want to add?
<yesno 2><break>

117601.「オッケー。\n そんじゃ できるまで ちょっと待っててね。\n<end>:
Okay. Just wait for a second.
<end>

117603.「ヤッホー。ここは アクセサリー合成屋だよ。\n みんなの熱～い ご要望に おこ:
Ya... This is accessory synthesis. In response to everyone's passionate requests, we've started a new service... From now on,
every time you synthesize an accessory, you'll earn useful points called Synthesis Experience and Synthesis Energy! If you
collect enough synthesis experience and increase your synthesis level, you'll occasionally get a lucky synthesis or a heart
synthesis. Lucky Synthesis means you'll get back the accessories you used to make the synthesis... It's a bit of a lucky
combination. And Lucky Charms... It's a dreamy synthesis that will give you the exact effect you're after... you'll love it! In
addition... each synthesized accessory gives you one point of Synthesis Energy... If you synthesize the same accessory over and over
again and the Synthesis Energy is full, the next synthesis will be the one you've been waiting for! What can I do for you today?

117604.<pipipi_off>\n<%dL_EXP> Pの合成経験値を かくとく！\n:
Received <%dL_EXP> Synthesis EXP!
Your Synthesis Level increases to Lv. <%dL_RANK>!

117605.「今の合成レベルと レベルボーナスは\n こんな感じに なってるね。\n<bre:
This is your current Synthesis Level and any
level bonuses you have.<break>

117606.<pipipi_on>\n「でっきた～♪ うまいこといったよ！\n しかも ラッ:
<pipipi_on>
Nice, got it! Lucky you, this synthesis
didn't use up your material! Enjoy!
<bw_break>

117607.「ウチの アクセサリー合成屋では\n 同じアクセサリー同士を 合成することで\n:
At my accessory synthesizer, you can combine the same accessories to enhance them... But be careful, because the accessory you choose
for the synthesis will be lost. You can add up to three effects to a single accessory... After you've added three effects, if you want
to add another effect, go back to the synthesis challenge! When the result of the synthesis challenge has been decided, you can
choose which of the overflowing effects you want to remove... You'll need <%nL_ACCE_GOLD> gold for the synthesis challenge, and
<%nL_ACCE_DLT_GOLD> gold to remove the effect, so...

117608.「普通の合成とは別に 違う種類のアクセ同士を\n 組み合わせることで 伝承効果っ:
You can combine different types of jewelry to create special effects called "lore effects. First, you'll need to add three of these
effects to a piece of jewelry. Then, when you combine them with a different type of accessory... Ta-da! One of the synthetic
effects on the synthetic material will be added as a lore effect... and if you add three normal synthetic effects to the
accessory with one lore effect and then combine it with a different type of accessory... You'll get the original lore
effect and one of the three additional lore effects as a second lore effect! The first lore effect is called "First Lore" and the
second is called "Second Lore." I'm not sure if this will show up on the test. Also, Lore Synthesis doesn't increase your Synthesis
Energy, and Lucky Synthesis and Kaiun Synthesis don't happen, so be careful... There are only a few accessory combinations
that can have the Lore effect... To find out which items can be synthesized, check the item's "See More" section.

117609.「合成レベルが高くなると たまーに\n ラッキー合成や 会心の合成っていう\n:
When you're high enough, you can sometimes get lucky and get a special synthesis called the "Kai-Kokoro Synthesis. In Lucky
Synthesis, you'll get back the accessory you used to make the synthesis instead of losing it. A slightly lucky combination... And then
there's the mind-blowing synthesis... It's a dreamy synthesis that will give you the exact effect you're after... you'll love it! You'll
get the experience you need to raise your synthesis level... by synthesizing accessories. The harder the accessory is to
get, the more experience you get when you synthesize it... If it's something you can buy at a store, it might not be as good...
I'll give you a discount if you make a lot of synthesized items and raise your level... I... Don't tell the others, okay?

117610.「合成したアクセサリーには\n 一度の合成につき １ポイントだけ\n 合成エナジ:
Each synthesized accessory has one point of Synthesis Energy... If you synthesize the same accessory over and over again, and it's
full of Synthesis Energy, the next synthesis will always be a heartfelt synthesis... If the material you synthesize is full of
Synthesis Energy, that point will be transferred to the new accessory, and you'll get an extra point... If you want to know how
many Synthesis Energy you have, you can check it by looking at the accessory closely... On the left is your current Energy, on the right
is your maximum Energy...

117611.「どの説明が 聞きたいんだい？\n<break>: Which explanation do you want to hear?<break>

117612.<select_se_off>\nアクセサリー合成について\n伝承合成について\:
<select_se_off>
